傳說中的洞窟 : 改版 1卷
在王國歷史開始被記載的{nl}許久之前，這塊土地上就流傳著{nl}一些關於神秘又驚奇的{nl}故事。{nl}這本書記載著{nl}在那些故事之中，{nl}最為人知曉的三個傳說{nl}故事。
在無數的傳說之中，{nl}選定往後要記錄場所{nl}的原因，是因為{nl}{nl} 民眾對寶物與黃金等財富{nl}的關心，相當濃厚，{nl}甚至成為女神信仰{nl}的基石。{nl}{nl} 現在在三個故事之中，{nl}我就來為你簡單介紹{nl}阿爾蘭必傳說吧。

哎..? 你是看了警告文才過來的嗎..?{nl}我等等再跟你講吧.
{nl}先吃藥吧.快點啦!{nl}這裡很容易被危險的諾貝禮爾傳染病傳染的地方啊!
{nl}連瘟疫醫生大師也覺得那是個來路不明的可怕的傳染病呢!{nl}是神樹之日以後,那些來到諾貝禮爾森林避難的居民們發現的

希望一切都不算太遲.{nl}因為那個藥啊也不算是成品呢!

如果覺得有發燒還是頭暈的話.. 有點異狀一定要趕快講喔
你看起來沒甚麼事呢!{nl}我是 尤克利那斯.{nl}我是專門在這裡調查諾貝禮爾傳染病的瘟疫醫生
{nl}就像我剛剛跟你說的啦,諾貝禮爾傳染病是在那些難民身上發現的一種恐怖的疾病.{nl}瘟疫醫生大師雖然出現阻止疾病擴散，不過要完全控制住傳染速度大師的能力是有限的
{nl}發現進度落後後,為了調查這個傳染病發源地我才被派了過來{nl}跟我一起到這裡來的希凱斯為了進行調查太忙反而錯過了服要的時間點結果得到傳染病了.
{nl}要帶著病患回去那裏太勉強了,我已經幫你請求支援了，,等一下就會有人過來了.{nl}只是覺得這樣兩手空空就回去很悶呢!
{nl}偶爾我也會想到那些被病魔纏身的痛苦的病患們的樣子就真心覺得…
能幫幫我嗎?{nl}跟第一次見面的你提出這樣的要求真不很不要臉不過..{nl}我是為了那些被病魔纏身的患者們才向你請求的.{nl}
你到愛梅特森林 入口處的話，那裏有個裝滿吸收成份的試驗液的桶子.{nl}如果有任何傳染病的因子就會自動被吸收進那裏面喔.
你能不能幫我用那個桶子裝一些試驗液呢?{nl}已經安裝好幾個探測裝置了，應該已經囤積不少了吧.
試驗液裡面應該會有能分析傳染病的因子存在啊..
唉呀找到了呢!{nl}來給我看看吧!{nl}
呃.. 看起來沒甚麼特別的呢.{nl}空氣中沒有任何傳染病因子啊.
之前因為覺得很浪費時間做到一半就想放棄, 看來現在還是不得不安裝傳染病感應石了啊!{nl}瘟疫醫生為了探測傳染病的氣息,特別自製的探測裝置.
原本是用來尋找病患的..沒想到用來偵測傳染病的因子也很有效呢!{nl}我會給你一個傳染病感應石你把這個安裝到諾貝禮爾十字路口那禮吧.
安裝在諾貝禮爾十字路口空間寬廣的地方就可以了.{nl}再等一下應該就會有反應了吧.
這應該是目前最有效的方法了,不過不知道會花多久時間呢.{nl}說不定幾天以後會有反應也說不定喔!
都安裝好了嗎?{nl}我們就慢慢等吧!
在等待傳染病感應石有反應的同時,來去做別的調查吧.{nl}因為不知道何時會有反應啊!{nl}
我要去諾貝禮爾森林採集植物標本.{nl}下層運輸地那裏有兩個行李放在那裏,打開應該就可以找到植物標本採集道具.{nl}
希凱斯得到傳染並整個人精神渙散,沒辦法好好整理.{nl}你用植物標本採集道具去採集標本吧!
找到植物標本採集道具就到諾貝禮爾瀑布那裏去收集植物標本吧.{nl}只要收集草或著是樹根之類的東西就可以了.
從植物標本上沒找到甚麼的話就得調查怪物了.
你把植物標本帶來了嗎?{nl}
我看看..{nl}這裡也找不到甚麼特別的東西.
得去看看怪物標本了.{nl}再幫我一下吧!{nl}
怪物的標本得用特殊藥品來進行採集.{nl}原本是在希凱斯身上,情急之下就忘在調查的地方了.{nl}
到神樹石橋去的話可以找到希凱斯用過的特殊溶液與標本保存瓶.{nl}原本就忙翻了結果現在卻一點也想不起來放在哪裡呢.
想找到特殊溶液與標本保存瓶必須到上層運輸地去.{nl}對那邊的怪物潑灑特殊溶液然後再消滅牠們就可以囉.{nl}
怪物死掉以後細胞硬化就無法得到正確資訊了.{nl}所以必須防止特殊溶液使細胞硬化.
希望我們忙碌的同時傳染病感應石已經產生反應了.
喔,保存得很好嘛!{nl}我看看..{nl}
嗯.. 好像有感應到甚麼氣息的樣子..{nl}光用這個難道還不夠..{nl}
也不確定是不是跟諾貝禮爾的傳染病有沒有關聯性呢!{nl}得回去好好調查了!
現在應該可以去確認傳染病感應石有沒有感應到甚麼了吧!{nl}幫我把安裝在諾貝禮爾十字路口的傳染病感應石帶給我吧.
希望會有反應啊..

從你帶來的傳染病感應石上我也感受到一股很強大的訊息呢!{nl}跟瘟神的氣息很類似..又有些許不同.{nl}
更強大也更令人害怕的氣息呢!{nl}這麼一來在諾貝禮爾十字路口目睹的有可能就是傳染病的真面目了呢!{nl}
你這樣一說我才想到有聽說過以前關於瘟神的故事呢.{nl}以前的人認為瘟神就是災難及不幸的象徵.{nl}

而且,這就是瘟神的核心啊!{nl}這一定就是傳染病產生的最終源頭了.{nl}
把這個拿給瘟疫醫生大師他一定能製作出治療藥劑的.{nl}謝謝你了.{nl}
剛好支援的人都到了呢!{nl}希凱斯狀況越來越不好了,趕快出發回去吧!{nl}
我不會忘記你的幫忙會好好轉達的.{nl}你拯救了那些被諾貝禮爾傳染病折磨個半死的患者們啊!
There's a disease spreading around here.{nl}You should leave while you still can.
I must think of those suffering from the Nobreer Epidemic and find a clue.
奎波爾蕾妮亞
I am a Kupole at the service of Goddess Laima.{nl}I'm waiting for the right time here under Her orders.
The treaty that goddesses and demons signed many, many eras ago is more than a simple agreement.
One of my tasks is soon to be completed, it seems.
I do regret not paying closer attention to Laima's words, but we mustn't stop.{nl}The world is not quite over yet.{nl}
I'm certain there will be other many actions to take, I believe Her words.{nl}Surely She still has hope.
歡迎光臨!!{nl}我們等您很久啦!!!救援者大人.{nl}我事負責侍奉拉伊瑪女神的奎波爾蕾妮亞.
{nl}遠古以前,拉伊瑪女神就預言你終有一天會來到這裡的.{nl}而且她也提到她有東西有交給你.
{nl}那是很久以前發生的事情了.. 傳說中的女神與魔族的故事.{nl}為了要讓你可以面對那件事情我在這裡等你過來的
{nl}救援者啊!!完成她的心願吧,找回這裡過去的誓約確認過去所發生的事情吧!{nl}為了這整個世界,為了你, 還有為了4年前那些不相信女神的愚蠢之輩們吧...
拉伊瑪女神並沒有告訴我獲得誓約的方法.{nl}可能是深怕這個方法被不是救援者的人給知道吧.
{nl}拉伊瑪女神製作了寫有獲得誓約的方法 的預言之書.{nl}而且,女神說預言之書只有真正的救援者才能獲得.
{nl}為了獲得預言之書,你必須證明你是真正的救援者才行.{nl}到弗拉納西斯泰之路那裏的3個預言石塔正明你是真正的救援者吧!
{nl}如果是真正的救援者就可以獲得預言之書.
救援者必須獨自完成所有事情.{nl}我只是盡我的本分,把我該向你轉告的話轉達給你然後等待下一個只是而已.
找到預言之書了嗎?
預言之書是用拉伊瑪 女神的力量製作而成的.{nl}因此光靠命運的力量是無法窺看內容的.{nl}
基瑪斯之路那裏的命運的寶珠內含有她的力量.{nl}吸收命運的寶珠的力量,接著確認預言之書的內容,並且照著做吧!{nl}
現在我能做的,就只有等待你帶著誓約歸來而已.{nl}所有的事情都寫在預言之書上, 我會在尤德伊安的祭壇那等你.
前陣子魔族還在尤德伊安森林一帶徘徊.{nl}想必是覬覦這裡的誓約吧!
{nl}大概是不希望誓約落入救援者手中吧!{nl}拉伊瑪女神說一切都準備好了只是怕..
{nl}要是遇上了魔族,希望能馬上處理掉他們.
我的角色只不過是要傳達拉伊瑪女神的要對你說的話,還有等待結果而已.{nl}你才是這一切的關鍵.{nl}
不過, 要小心那些覬覦誓約的魔族啊!
女神的誓約, 魔族的誓約還有誓約的石板都入手囉!
現在該確認誓約的內容囉!{nl}尤德伊安的祭壇可以閱讀誓約的內容吧!{nl}
將誓約的石板放上尤德伊安的祭壇,並顯現出女神的誓約與魔族的誓約的內容吧!{nl}據說這樣就可以閱讀誓約的內容了.{nl}
內容是甚麼, 救援者代表的意義是甚麼,我一概不知.{nl}但是, 拉伊瑪女神說要透過這個預言傳達些甚麼給你,不確定是甚麼但應該是非常重要的事情喔!
誓約是千年以前.. 嗯不對,比那還要更久遠的以前,是個女神與魔族彼此締結的誓約 .{nl}可能你早就知道了,或著你根本連聽都沒聽過呀呵呵.{nl}
不確定內容是甚麼,只知道不管怎樣都一定要確實轉達給你知道.{nl}拉伊瑪女神是這樣吩咐我們的.
要是我當初有聽拉伊瑪 女神的話,現在情況會不會就不同呢?{nl}雖然現在這樣講有點太遲了.
確認誓約的內容了嗎?{nl}
我不知道誓約對你到底具有怎樣的意義呢.{nl}我只知道救援者絕對要知道這件事.{nl}
我們的位來就掌握在你的手裡了.{nl}你做出的每一個選擇有可能會是能拯救這世界的每一步啊.{nl}
願救援者的的未來充滿祝福..

封印的光換成其他顏色
預言之書 : 必須先將守護誓約的封印的保護魔法解開. 另外如果要將誓約的封印周圍的封印的光換成其他顏色的話保護魔法就會消失.
解除守護誓約的封印的保護
預言之書 : 封印的光發出不一樣的光芒的話, 就表示保護誓約的封印的魔法可以解除了.對誓約的封印使用 命運的力量解除保護魔法吧!

預言之書 : 為了獲得魔族的誓約, 需要邪惡祭物.但是沒有救援者會把那個東西隨身帶在身上吧! 也許有點不太夠,但應該可以先用怪物的血來擋著用,怪物的血也帶有不祥之氣喔! 先消滅怪物取得邪惡的血吧!
用魔族的氣息填滿尤德伊安的邪惡的血

請你趁機快點進入通往那魯巴斯寺院的道路。

反抗軍雷歐納勒達斯
你，你是誰？什麼？亞普拉奧摩斯拜託你來找我的嗎？哈哈...謝謝...{nl}現在真的...要死了....我是這麼認為...真的…只會造成哥哥的麻煩....謝謝你願意前來。
我還有事情要做，希望你去藍扣 22水域消滅蘇科姆！{nl}雖然不太可能會發生，但若是你有其他意圖，希望你別忘記你要找的人在我這邊。
…謝謝你願意來。反正觀看者大概拜是託你來取我性命吧，{nl}死之前我想問你一件事…我想知道觀看者說了我哪些事情。
觀看者怎麼會有那種想法…看來你並不是自願幫忙的。我大概知道情況了，{nl}我告訴你一件事。觀看者吩咐你裝入寶珠中的並不是我的魔力。{nl}
水晶石真正的作用是記錄周圍的情報。意即，你裝的是水晶石裡的情報，{nl}那麼試著思考一下。若是那些情報落入觀看者的手中...會使用在哪個地方呢？
理解能力還真強。你...
殺了我吧！
雖然收到了這項要求，但卻沒收到破壞水晶石的要求，{nl}這就是重點！破壞觀看者想要保護的所有水晶石，進而妨礙他的目的便是我的提議。{nl}
對於被利用的你來說並非壞事。若是有任何想法就告訴我吧。
你的任務就是破壞兩個水晶石、以及藍扣 26水域的所有水晶石，{nl}藍扣 26水域的水晶石只要利用連結這裡的自爆裝置即可。不需刻意承受危險。{nl}
就先從這邊的水晶石開始。那吉魯斯後院很近，先去破壞那邊的水晶石吧！{nl}安全裝置會啟動，全部都破壞吧！如此一來水晶石就會被破壞。
不是只有那個水晶石而已，其他水晶石也都以不同的方法受到保護，{nl}這是為了防止紀錄被其他人奪走。什麼？是不是想要獨佔情報？{nl}
什麼..也對，在你眼裡大概會認為是那樣吧。
嗯，真是厲害。接下來是庭院的水晶石。
庭院的水晶石就和你在藍扣 26水域看見的交叉路的水晶石一樣受到魔法保護，{nl}反正如果要破壞的話，使用連魔法都能貫穿的炸彈不是比較好嗎？！{nl}
不過現在沒有炸彈，你必須親手製作才行。這邊是炸彈的製造方法與材料，{nl}剩下的材料根部可以向百合花精與魔花取得。製造炸彈後，利用炸彈破壞水晶石吧！
觀看者至今還只是派遣部下過來而已，自己卻不願意行動，{nl}他到底想做什麼呢…
非常好。接下來就是觀看者留在藍扣 26水域的水晶石，{nl}一定是有某個陰謀，才會刻意留在那邊吧。但我不會讓觀看者得逞。
自爆裝置藏在德雷格納思空地的岩石當中。只要找出來後啟動即可，{nl}想要啟動需要一點時間，為了防止突發狀況，最好對周圍進行徹底的戒備。
聽過你的話後，我終於明白要讓觀看者回心轉意根本就是不可能的事情！{nl}既然如此，不能對那小子的計畫放任不管。這是我最後做出的結論！
終於消滅所有的水晶石了！既然妨礙了他的計畫，觀看者大概也會覺得頭痛吧！{nl}然後他就會展開行動來找我們吧。因此在被發現之前，我想再拜託你一件事。
我認為現在拜託的事情對你來說大概有些困難，{nl}但一想到你的未來，說不定那會是非常不錯的提議。怎麼樣？你要聽聽看嗎？
雖然發生了出乎意料的事情，既然事情順利結束了，那就算了吧。{nl}你在尋找的副官已經被我釋放了。現在大概已經回去找反抗軍了吧。{nl}
那就在這邊分手吧！下次見面前可要好好保重！{nl}這樣我才能取你的性命不是嗎？！
雖然我很想立刻回去找大家，但因為傷痕累累，根本就無法自由行動。{nl}想要安全回去的話，我想進行一項準備，你願意幫忙嗎？！
謝謝你。可以先幫忙尋找材料嗎？{nl}請先去向這附近的百合花精和魔花取得食用湖水長大的葉子。
你知道嗎？這個星之湖的水以前原本對魔族深具致命性，{nl}雖然現在不如從前，我想製造能稍微發揮效力的成品。
謝謝你。那就進入下一個階段吧？
我想製造的是讓這個星之湖的效能重現的樹液。但光憑那個葉子並不夠！{nl}那旁邊有魔族的倉庫，我在那邊看見了魔法效果催化劑。可以去幫忙收集嗎？
其實我之所以會想要製作這個東西，是因為我在躲避魔族時發現了那個倉庫，{nl}偶然開啟了箱子，結果就發現了那個東西！當時我便想是不是能製作這個東西呢？！
哇！謝謝你。接下來只要製造樹液就行了。
好，接下來就開始製作吧！可以利用那些材料和我給的水瓶製作樹液嗎？！{nl}這是寫有製作方法的製作書。你似乎比我更熟悉這種東西，一切拜託了。
希望製作出來的東西能和我預期中的一樣。現在大家一定都很擔心我吧？{nl}因為違抗命令專程來到這裡…雖然很清楚會被罵，但真想快點回去。
啊，已經完成了呀！剩下的就是對魔族試驗一下效果。
我會給你一桶樹液，試著去向周圍的魔族使用樹液吧。{nl}如果有效果，魔族應該會出現某種反應。然後就請消滅出現反應的魔族吧。
有反應嗎？消滅有反應的魔族時不覺得困難嗎？{nl}老實說要創造出腦海中想像的物品讓人有些不安。希望一切順利。
謝謝！製作樹液的期間，大概是狀況穩定的關係，受傷的地方也稍微痊癒了。{nl}接下來只要帶著製作好的樹液回去就好了。
等一下！抱歉，打擾你了。我必須回到同伴們在的地方，因為我受傷了…{nl}若是你願意的話，可以消滅周圍的魔族讓我安全回去嗎？！
我必須回到同伴們在的地方，因為我受傷了，但回去的路上有許多魔族，{nl}若是你願意的話，可以消滅周圍的魔族讓我安全回去嗎？！
大家應該都很擔心吧。違抗命令盲目地衝出來找人...{nl}大家都平安無事吧...副官怎麼樣了呢...
謝謝你。雖然還有魔族存在，但多虧你的幫忙，才能稍微降低數量。{nl}若是之後有空的話，請再多稍微幫忙我吧。
啊啊，這下該怎麼辦呢....真是雪上加霜，壞事不斷地發生呢..{nl}你....不，沒事。別在意，抱歉打擾你了。
真的很感謝你協助我們，{nl}若是沒有你的話，我什麼都辦不到，只會不斷地重複後悔。
噢，是你呀，快過來吧。剛才聯絡兵說副官已經回來了，真是謝謝你！{nl}我們想要留下來繼續觀察周圍的情況。就算回來了，我們依然要繼續任務。
當時就該抓住他才對的...如果抓到他的話，大概就不會發生這種事了吧....
什麼？雷歐納勒達斯還活著嗎？噢噢，看來女神在保護我們...啊啊...{nl}謝謝，真是太感謝了。女神啊....
雷歐納勒達斯在準備回來了？帶著受傷的身體？噢，糟糕…{nl}為了讓那孩子能安全回來，得做些準備才行。謝謝你的幫忙。
還有其他事情要做嗎？如果在意我做的事情，{nl}我話先說在前頭，這件事並非你能理解的水準，所以不要太費心思，快點走吧。
呃...得快點回去才行，但受傷的身體卻不聽使喚....大家都沒事嗎....
我很想快點回到同伴身邊，但身體狀況卻是這副德性…{nl}可以稍微幫忙我一下嗎？
我的傷勢已經好一點了，差不多也該準備了！{nl}都已經來這裡了，我想要多紀錄一下這附近。謝謝你的幫忙。
好。那就正式談論吧。
嗯...怪物們竟然帶著物資逃走了！{nl}因為注意力全都放在魔族身上，沒想到會發生這種情況…
看來得快點補修祭壇才行了…{nl}魔族會破壞祭壇…
我得去執行尤拉泰女神的任務，但卻慢慢覺得力不從心呢。
魔族的攻勢逐漸增強當中，{nl}該怎麼辦呢…
埃莫艾利斯
魔族的計畫失敗了，但要做的事情還很多。
這裡是獲得尤拉泰女神祝福的地方，但卻變成這副模樣了。

First Guest's Role
Talk to Neringa

Enter Fantasy Library

You've entered Sausys Room 9. You are waiting for Goddess Vaivora to give instructions.
Neringa is waiting for you in Sausys Room 9.
Defeat the demons who have infiltrated the place

Collect scattered records

Nailed Down Destiny
Remove demons' Kupole traps
Neringa has asked you to destroy the traps that demons have set to stop Vaivora's Kupoles. It will be dangerous, but if you help her Kupoles, you will definitely gain her trust.
Talk to Kupole Rugile

You've removed enough points of invasion. Return to Kupole Rugile and report.

You've defeated enough demons. Return to Kupole Rugile and report.

Going Below the Shadow

Necessary Mistake
Neringa is waiting for you in Valandis Room 2.
You have finally caught Goddess Vaivora's attention. Talk to Goddess Vaivora.
Goddess Vaivora has left after giving instructions. Discuss the details with Neringa.
Neringa has informed you that killing demons will force Litae to come out and ask for more help. Go defeat some demons.
Talk to Kupole Litae
Kupole Litae has appeared, and is looking for you.
Kupole Litae is waiting for you in Valandis Room 2.
Recharge the magic device
Kupole Litae has told you that you must recharge the magic device for Goddess Vaivora to seal Giltine away. The recharged device will then appear where it's needed. Recharge the magic device.
You have recharged the magic device. Report to Kupole Litae.
Collect Nobrenal Powers
Neringa has asked you to collect Nobrenal Powers to protect yourself when facing Giltine. Collect Nobrenal Powers in Valandis Room 2.
You have collected enough Nobrenal Powers. Give them to Neringa.
Neringa has instructed you to meet with Goddess Vaivora.
Talk to Kupole Danute
Kupole Danute is waiting for you in Valandis Room 2.
Collect the necessary tools for maintaining the magic device

Kupole Danute has mentioned that maintaining magic devices is crucial in carrying out Vaivora's plans. However, more Dimensional Essences are needed for that. You've been asked to defeat demons and take their magic sources.
You've collected enough magic sources. Give them to Kupole Danute.
Protect the Protection Crystal
Kupole Danute has asked you to protect the Protection Crystal in Valandis Room 2. This will help Vaivora's plan. Eliminate the demons around the Protection Crystal to protect it.
You have protected the Protection Crystal. Report to Kupole Danute.
Alter for the Seal
Giltine hasn't fallen for Goddess Vaivora's trap. Defeat the Templeshooters and retrieve Record: Giltine from them.
You've retrieved Record: Giltine by defeating Templeshooters. Discuss with Neringa about the next plan.
The History that Will Not Be Recorded
Neringa is waiting for you in Valandis Room 3.
Neringa has told you to listen to Goddess Vaivora's plans from her, and follow further instructions.
You have listened to Goddess Vaivora's plans. Before carrying out her plans, discuss with Neringa.
Goddess Vaivora is waiting for you in Valandis Room 3.
Protect the Bluenode Collapsing Device
Goddess Vaivora has asked you to protect the Bluenode Collapsing Device for it to run in a stable state.
You have defeated all demons who have been attacking the Bluenode Collapsing Device.
Collect Gigantic Magic Sources
Goddess Vaivora has asked you to collect Gigantic Magic Sources to recharge the Flicid Collapsing Device. She has also told you to go to Neringa for instructions after collecting the sources.
You have collected enough Gigantic Magic Sources. Go to Neringa for further instructions.
Activate the Flicid Collapsing Device
Neringa has instructed you on the final plan and how to activate the Flicid Collapsing Device. Activate the Flicid Collapsing Device.
The Flicid Collapsing Device has been activated. Report to Goddess Vaivora.
Talk to Kupole Scaia
Goddess Vaivora has asked you to help Kupole Scaia and activate the Ballandans Collapsing Device. First, go find Kupole Scaia.
Kupole Scaia is waiting for you in Valandis Room 3.
Kupole Scaia has asked you to defeat the demons in the area to activate the collapsing device. Defeat the demons and activate the Ballandans Collapsing Device.
Activate the Ballandans Collapsing Device
Kupole Scaia has asked you to activate the Ballandans Collapsing Device. Activate the device and protect it from the demons' attacks.
You have activated the Ballandans Collapsing Device. Return to Goddess Vaivora.
Defeat Demon Lord Lucy

Neringa has instructed you to make it look as if demons have destroyed the Ballanorth Collapsing Device. After activating the device, defeat Demon Lord Lucy near the device. After defeating Demon Lord Lucy, the magic explosion will overload the collapsing device and destroy it.
As planned, Demon Lord Lucy has been defeated, and the Ballanorth Collapsing Device has been destroyed due to overload. Report to Neringa.
Neringa is waiting for you in Valandis Room 91.
Shadow of the Black Wing
Destroy Demon Dimensional Door
Before fighting Giltine, Neringa has told you to destroy the Dimensional Doors that the demons have been using for their invasions. Destroy all the Dimensional Doors before meeting with Neringa.
Track down Giltine
Neringa has told you that Giltine has approached the Revelation. Protect and follow Neringa to track down Giltine.
Confront Demon Goddess Giltine
Demon Goddess Giltine has finally reached the Revelation. Neringa has told you to follow Laima's prophesy and put on end to the plan.
You have followed Laima's prophesy. Report to Goddess Vaivora.
Defeat the demons carrying Magic Signals
Kupole Rugile has asked you to eliminate demons who have been creating points of invasions. Defeat the demons who are carrying Magic Signals.
You have defeated enough demons carrying Magic Signals. Report to Kupole Rugile.
Kupole Rugile has told you that the demons have stolen unidentified records. Defeat the demons to retrieve the records.
You have retrieved enough unidentified records. Give them to Kupole Rugile.
Talk to Skirgaila
Something has happened to Skirgaila, who is a member of the resistance scouts.{nl}Go talk to Skirgaila.
Talk to the Beholder
A lieutenant of the search squad has been captured by the Beholder.{nl}Find the Beholder and ask what happened.
You'll have to help the Beholder to save the lieutenant.{nl}Talk to the Beholder.
Absorb magic from a Crystal stone in Prieblanda Rest Place

In order to remove the protection wall surrounding a Crystal Stone in Prieblanda Rest Place, find the deactivation procedure to deactivate its protection. After the protection has been removed, absorb magic from the Crystal Stone.
You have deactivated the Crystal Stone and filled the orb with magic.{nl}Give the orb to the Beholder.
Ask the Beholder where the next crystal is.
Absorb magic from a Crystal Stone in Lemtis Lot

The Beholder has asked you to absorb magic from a Crystal Stone in the Lot.{nl}Investigate the Crystal Stone to find the deactivation procedure and deactivate its protection. After the protection has been removed, absorb magic from the Crystal Stone.
You have absorbed magic from the Crystal Stone in the lot.{nl}Talk to the Beholder to hand over the absorbed magic.
Investigate the Crystal Stone in Lemtis Lot
Crystal Stone in the crossroad
You have absorbed magic from the Crystal Stone in the lot. Hand over the orb to the Beholder and ask where to find next.
Absorb magic from the Crystal Stone in Zibukas Crossroad
The Beholder has asked you to check the Crystal Stone in Zibukas Crossroad.{nl}Go to the crossroad to investigate.
The Crystal Stone in Zibukas Crossroad seems to be protected with strong magic.{nl}Inform the Beholder about this.
The Beholder might have some ideas on how to remove the protection.{nl}Talk to the Beholder.
Absorb magic with a Magic Nullifying Tool
The Beholder has given you a tool to nullify magic, and told you to fill the tool with magic.{nl}Defeat the demons in the area to absorb their souls into the tool.
You have filled the tool with magic.{nl}Use the tool to nullify the protection and absorb the Crystal Stone's magic.
You have nullified the protection and absorbed its magic into an orb.{nl}Take it to the Beholder.{nl}
You have given the Beholder the orb, but the Beholder doesn't seem to be satisfied.{nl}Listen to what the Beholder has to say.
Investigate the area around the crossroad
The Beholder has asked you to investigate the area around the crossroad.{nl}Go investigate where the Beholder has mentioned.
You have defeated all demons who have ambushed you.{nl}Tell the Beholder what happened.
Defeat ambushing demons

Battle with Demon Lord Solcomm
It was Demon Lord Solcomm who sent out the light.{nl}In order to save the lieutenant from the Beholder, you must defeat Solcomm.
Injured Solcomm has run away from the battle.{nl}Go to the Beholder and ask what the next plan is.

Burn the Supply Boxes
Skirgaila says they have found some supply boxes that are owned by demons.{nl} Go to Menua Crossroad and burn the supply boxes in the area.
You have burned all the supply boxes in the area.{nl}Go back to Skirgaila and report.
Skirgaila is impressed with your capabilities, and have more favors to ask.{nl}Talk to Skirgaila.
Investigate Zibukas Crossroad
Skirgaila has asked you to examine and record the ecosystem of Zibukas Crossroad.{nl}Go to the crossroad and record what you've found.
You have recorded all the necessary information.{nl}Bring the recorded document and hand it over to Skirgaila.
Skirgaila has found something from the record you've made.{nl}Talk to Skirgaila.
Burn the supplies wagon at the crossroad
Pour oil over the demons' supply wagon and use a match to burn it.
You have burned all the supply wagons.{nl}Report to Skirgaila.
Skirgaila needs more help for the investigation.{nl}Talk to Skirgaila.
Defeat demons around Lanko 26 Waters
Defeat demons around Lanko 26 Waters for the resistance and their investigations.
You have defeated all demons around Lanko 26 Waters.{nl}Report to Skirgaila.
Where is the Recruit?
Talk to Abraomas
Abraomas is worried about a recruit who has ignored orders and went out alone to look for the missing lieutenant.{nl}Listen to what Abraomas has to say.
Track down the recruit
Search for clues on the whereabouts of the recruit.{nl}Gather everything you can.
You have gathered enough clues.{nl}Go to Abraomas.
Abraomas is getting restless after hearing what you've found.{nl}Talk to Abraomas.
Look for the recruit
Abraomas isn't ready to give up yet. He has asked you to go to the other side to look for the recruit.{nl}Go over the other side to look for the recruit.
You have learned some clues to whereabouts of the recruit from a demon you defeated.{nl}Pass the information to Abraomas.
Looking for clues on the recruit
Defeated %
Abraomas seems to be relieved to hear about the recruit.{nl}Talk to Abraomas.
Talk to Leonardas
Abraomas has asked you to help the recruit who is in danger.{nl}Go to Lanko 22 Waters and find Leonardas.
The Beholder wants you to follow Solcomm.{nl}Talk to the Beholder.
Find Solcomm
Go to Lanko 22 Waters and track down Solcomm.{nl}
Talk to Demon Lord Solcomm
By following the blue light, you were able to find Solcomm, who seems to be injured.{nl}Solcomm wants to tell you something.{nl}Listen to what he has to say.
Solcomm has a proposition for you.{nl}Talk to Solcomm.
Solcomm is offering you a deal.{nl}Take the deal, and ask for details.
Solcomm wants to destroy the crystal stones nearby.{nl}Ask Solcomm for details.
Destroy the crystal stone in Negilus Inner Court

Solcomm has told you that the crystal stone in Negilus Inner Court can be destroyed by blowing up its protection devices.{nl}Go to Negilus Inner Court and activate the crystal stone's protection devices by touching them. After that, destroy the devices.
You have destroyed the crystal stone in the inner court.{nl}Go back to Solcomm.
Crystal stone in the garden
There is another crystal stone that needs to be destroyed. Go talk to Solcomm.{nl}
Craft a Magic Dispel Bomb
Solcomm wants you to destroy the crystal and its protection magic located in Oro Garden.{nl}With the recipe Solcomm gave you, craft a
Magic Dispel Bomb!
{nl}The root can be collected from Lily Velly and Jelly Velly.
Craft %s
Destroy the crystal stone in Oro Garden
You have crafted a magic dispel bomb.{nl}Use the bomb to destroy the crystal stone.
Talk to Solcomm
You have destroyed the crystal stone in the garden.{nl}Go back to Solcomm.
Solcomm wants to tell you how to destroy the crystal stone on the other side.{nl}Go and talk to Solcomm.
Activate the self-destruction device in Dregnas Lot
Solcomm has hidden a self-destruction device in Dregnas Lot.{nl}Inspect the rocks in the lot to find the device and activate it.{nl}Some demons might appear to attack you.
You can feel the ground trembling. It seems that the crystal stone was destroyed.{nl}Go back to Solcomm.
After all the crystal stones have been destroyed, Solcomm is deep in thought.{nl}Talk to Solcomm.
Battle with Solcomm
Solcomm wants you to help him to defeat the Beholder. However, in order to save the Lieutenant, you need to defeat Solcomm.{nl}Defeat Solcomm in a battle.
You have defeated Solcomm.{nl}Go talk to the Beholder to save the Lieutenant.
Leonardas wants you to do something for him to safely return to his peers.{nl}Talk to Leonardas.
Collect ingredients
Leonardas wants to craft a special sap. Collect leaves from Lily Velly and Jelly Velly.
You have collected the leaves for Leonardas.{nl}Give them to Leonardas.
Talk to Leonardas to hear what his next plans are.
Find catalysts from the storage
Search boxes in a storage near Sviesus Crossroad to find magic catalysts.
You have gathered enough catalysts.{nl}Give them to Leonardas.
Find magic catalysts from boxes
Leonardas has begun crafting the sap.{nl}Receive instructions from Leonardas.
Combine Sap Infused with the Spirit of Lake
Leonardas has asked you to create the sap by using collected ingredients, his tools, and essence of the lake.{nl}Combine the sap by following his instructions.{nl}
You have combined the sap.{nl}Go back to Leonardas.
Leonardas wants to test the combined sap.{nl}Talk to Leonardas.
Testing the sap on monsters
Leonardas has asked you to run tests with the combined sap.{nl}Use the sap on demons to check its effectiveness.{nl}After that, defeat the weakened demons.
You have confirmed the sap's effectiveness.{nl}Go to Leonardas and report.
Leonardas is having troubles due to his injuries.{nl}Go talk to Leonardas.
Defeat the surrounding demons and monsters
Defeat the demons and monsters around the area for Leonardas to return safely back to his peers.
You have defeated enough demons and monsters.{nl}Go back to Leonardas.
I Can Hear You Singing
Follow the faint sound
You can hear a faint, comforting sound. Go find the source of the sound.
Find someone who knows the song
It seems that the song is coming from the trees. Ask the residents of Teresh Forest and passersby about the song.
Follow Indrea
Indrea, who is a priestess of Goddess Medeina, went to the singing tree. Follow her to learn about the song.
Talk to Indrea
Indrea has heard the song. Go talk to her.
Collect Atti Yellow Juice
Indrea has instructed you to follow the lyrics of the song. By sprinkling Atti Yellow Juice on flowers in Teresh, you can gain red stamen from them. Defeat Atties and collect their Yellow Juice.
You've gathered enough Yellow Juice. Talk to Indrea.
Use Yellow Juice to gather Teresh Pollen
Indrea mentioned that the flowers will soon wither away if sprinkled with the juice. Collect Teresh Pollen right after sprinkling Yellow Juice.
You have gathered enough Teresh stamen. Go to Indrea.
Indrea is planning to sprinkle red stamen near the tree. Talk to Indrea.
Listen to the sound from the tree
After Indrea has sprinkled red stamen, and the tree started singing again. Listen to the song.
A peculiar white apple has grown out of the tree. Talk to Indrea.
Follow Indrea
Follow Indrea and listen to the song coming from the tree.
Craft Raspberry Juice

Indrea has told you that people of Teresh Forest have been using the scent from crushed raspberries to attract star fireflies. Its light and direction were used to foresee the future. Indrea wants to do the same. Collect Raspberry Juice from the forest.
You've gathered enough Raspberry Juice. Talk to Indrea.
Indrea has applied the juice on branches. Talk to Indrea.
Attract starlights to the branch with raspberry scent
Indrea has instructed you to shake the branch to spread the scent. Use the branch to attract starlights to the singing tree.
You have attracted a starlight. Talk to Indrea.
You have attracted enough starlights. Talk to Indrea.
After attracting enough starlights, the tree started singing again. Listen to the song.
A peculiar yellow apple has grown out of the tree. Talk to Indrea.
Listen to the song with Indrea
Listen to the song's lyrics and find the meaning behind them.
Do as the lyrics say

Based on what Indrea has told you, Goddess Medeina called butterflies "The Preachers of Love" due to their nature of helping flowers mate. However, Indrea isn't sure what "Half of my heart" means. Find out what the goddess meant by the phrase, and act it out.
Something is happening to the tree. Talk to Indrea.
Defeat Rocktortuga
Rocktortuga has appeared when you were listening to the song with Indrea. Defeat Rocktortuga.
You have defeated Rocktortuga. Talk to Indrea.
You have reached the place mentioned in the song. Talk to Indrea.
Follow the song's lyrics
There are three pillars at Tacasz Stream. Indrea thinks that something will happen by placing the apples in these pillars. Do as she asks.
Talk to Indrea
Talk to the dog with no owner
The dog with no owner seems to be asking you to follow him. Follow the dog.
Follow the dog
The dog is going somewhere. Keep following.
The dog has lead you to a monk who seems tired. Talk to the monk.
The monk seems to be in a hurry. Talk to him.
Go to Narvas Temple

The monk told you that Arch Mage Agailla Flurry divided Hauberk into three parts and sealed them inside Narvas Temple. However, after Medzio Diena, the seal was cracked and some essence of Hauberk has leaked out. Nearby demons have noticed this, and have been attacking the temple to fully awaken Hauberk. The monk wants you to stop this in his stead. Some demons will be fighting amongst themselves along the way, so the monk has given you instructions on how to go through them. Read the instruction to avoid the demons and reach Narvas Temple.

The monk told you that Arch Mage Agailla Flurry divided Hauberk into three parts and sealed them inside Narvas Temple. However, after Medzio Diena, the seal was cracked and some essence of Hauberk has leaked out. Nearby demons have noticed this, and have been attacking the temple to fully awaken Hauberk. The monk wants you to stop this in his stead. Some demons will be fighting amongst themselves along the way, so the monk has given you instructions on how to go through them. Read the instruction to avoid the demons and reach Narvas Temple.
Creating Distractions
Read the instruction
Find out how to avoid the demons by reading the instructions.
You've learned that going straight through them isn't viable. Burn their camp first to create distractions. Defeat the demons in the base to burn the place down.
Defeat the demons in the camp.
Collect Sporgimo flowers

You've learned that going straight through the demons isn't a viable plan. Instead, burn their camp first to create a distraction. Gather Sporgimo flowers, which are highly inflammable, to burn the place down.
Place Sporgimo flowers
You've learned that going straight through the demons isn't a viable plan. Instead, burn their camp first to create a distraction. You have gathered enough Sporgimo flowers. Place them near the camp.
Burn the placed Sporgimo flowers

You've learned that going straight through demons isn't a viable plan. Instead, burn their camp first to create a distraction. You have placed some Sporgimo flowers around their camp. Light the flowers with fire to create an explosion.
Go find a place to hide
The flowers are on fire. These will soon explode, and it will attract demons. Go find a place to hide.
The flowers are on fire. These will soon explode, and it will attract demons. Go find a place to hide.
Go to Narvas Temple
You have set fire on the demons' camp. When the right moment comes, go to Narvas Temple.
Go to Narvas Temple.
Go through the demons' defense line
On the way to the temple, you've found a defense line created by demons. Fight through the line to reach the temple.
Go to Narvas Temple.
Defeat monsters who are on your way
Narvas Temple's barrier
Talk to Monk Aistis
Go talk to Monk Aistis.
Gather Demonic Essence

Monk Aistis has told you that the barrier's energy is about to run out. He asked you to bring Demonic Essence to use as its energy source. Defeat the demons in Izoliacjia Plateau to collect Demonic Essence.
Defeat demons to collect %s
Break the auxiliary detector system

Aistis has proposed to alter the detector system to turn them into something defensive. To do that, the detector system needs to be shut down. However, auxiliary detector systems will keep that from happening. Aistis will stop the detector system, so you must shut down its auxiliary systems.
Bring the parts from a destroyed defensive system nearby
Aistis needs parts from a destroyed defensive system to make repairs. However, there are demons near the place. Aistis will bring the parts, so you must defeat the demons in the area.
Collect the leaked energy.

Aistis thinks that despite the repairs, its lack of energy will keep the defensive system from working. He proposed to use the leaked energy to power the system. Use the energy storing globe he gave you to gather the energy.
Collect the leaked energy

Aistis found out that defensive systems are overloading. If the problem isn't solved, they will become useless. Aistis says he'll try to shut it down safely to prevent this. But in order to do that, its energy must be taken out, and reuse those energy to reboot the system. Aistis has asked you to gather the energy when he shut down the defensive systems.
Inject the gathered energy into the defensive system
Monk Aistis has safely turned off the defensive system. The system needs to be refueled to be turned on again. Refuel the defensive system after Aistis has activated the system.
Check how the defensive system is working
Aistis wants to check how the defensive system is working. Check how it is doing with Aistis.
Defeat demons who are entering Narvas temple
Go to Narvas Temple with Monk Aistis.
Into the Lion's Mouth
Talk to Monk Aistis.
Defeat followers of Suspicion Hauberk
Suspicion Hauberk has commanded his demons to destroy Agailla Flurry's equipment. Stop them.
Defeat followers of Suspicion Hauberk who are trying to destroy Flurry's equipment
Gather Strong Essence of Demon
Monk Aistis wants to upgrade Agailla Flurry's equipment. He needs Strong Essence of Demon to power the upgrade. Gather Strong Essence of Demon for him.
Defeat followers of Suspicion Hauberk to gather %s
Collect Black Hohen Mage's blood

Aistis has found out that equipment in the area are already ruined by followers of Suspicion Hauberk. However, its core components are still functional. With enough repairs, it can be fixed and even get upgraded. He needs some demonic blood to do this. Defeat Black Hohen Mage and bring its blood to Aistis.
Defeat Black Hohen Mage to gather %s
Collect Holy water mixed with demonic blood
Aistis thinks if holy water is mixed with demonic blood, the facilities will only target demons. He wants you to bring a bottle of holy water mixed with demonic blood.
Eavesdrop on Ambition Hauberk and his followers
Ambition Hauberk and his minions are planning something. Eavesdrop on them to find out what their plan is.
Talk to Aistis
Defeat the demons who are transforming monks' spirits
Some demons are transforming monks' spirits under Ambition Hauberk's command. Defeat them to release the monks' spirits.
Break the spirit altering device
Defeat %s, who are torturing the spirits
Collect Magic Crystals
Monk Aistis is going to upgrade Agailla Flurry's equipment. He will need some magic crystals after making the upgrade. Collect them for him.
Look around the unidentified facility
You've found an unidentified facility by following the light. Look around the place.
Retrieve the Apparition Generator from the locked system
Based on what you learned, find the Apparition Generator.
Place the parts in the unidentified facility
Place the parts in the unidentified facility.
Talk to Agailla Flurry Apparition
Talk to Agailla Flurry Apparition.
Give the magic crystal to Aistis
Agailla Flurry Apparition has told you to give the magic crystal to Aistis. Do as she says.
In order to retrieve Agailla Flurry's Staff from its container, Aistis needs the surrounding demons gone. Defeat the demons to retrieve the staff.
Approach Deception Hauberk
Agailla Flurry Apparition has proposed that you approach Deception Hauberk by meddling with his mind. Do as she says.
Suspiciously Secretive
Agailla Flurry's equipment

Monk Aistis needs some parts to upgrade the equipment. However, the monk doesn't know what the parts look like. Because of this, he wants you to use an Absorbing Stone. With the stone, the parts will just come to you. Use the stone to gather the parts.
Gather Demon's Flesh

The apparition has told you that Suspicion Hauberk needs to be informed of what Deception Hauberk is doing. However, just like his name, Suspicion Hauberk is quite suspicious of everything, so approaching him won't be easy. The apparition wants you to kill his minion and disguise yourself as it to get close. First, you'll need Demon's Flesh to do this. Go find some.
Defeat a core follower of Suspicion Hauberk
The apparition has told you that one of the core followers of Suspicion Hauberk is looking for something. Find the follower and defeat him to use his blood for disguise.
Defeat King Hammer and collect %s
Approach Suspicion Hauberk
A scroll for disguising into one of Suspicion Hauberk's core followers has been completed. Use the scroll to approach him, and inform him of what Deception Hauberk is doing.
Alter the Contract Token
Agailla Flurry needs to alter the equipment to utilize the Contract Token. Do as she says.
Give the Contract Token to Suspicion Hauberk
The Contract Token is altered. Use the scroll to turn into King Hammer and give the token to Suspicion Hauberk.
Alter the Registry Orb

Agailla Flurry has told you that Ambition Hauberk needs to be informed of what Deception Hauberk is doing. His core follower is already dead, so you'll need to brainwash Ambition Hauberk's minions to drive him to action. There is a Registry Orb in the area which helps managers of this place to remember small details. Agailla Flurry has proposed to use the altered version of the orb and use it on their minions. Alter the Registry Orb as she suggested.
Find the essence of an elite follower of Hauberk

Agailla Flurry Apparition has told you that you need to brainwash the elite followers of Ambition Hauberk. However, it isn't easy telling the elites apart from the other followers. The apparition is going to craft a mark of identification by using the essence from elites. Defeat the elite followers to collect their essence.
Defeat Harugal to collect %s
Use the Registry Orb on Black Harugal, one of Ambition Hauberk's elite followers

The apparition has asked you to use the mark of identification to find Black Harugals, who are Ambition Hauberk's elite followers, and use the Registry Orb on them. Weaken them first, and use the Registry Orb on them by clicking on the item in the inventory.
Observe Ambition Hauberk's situation
Observe how Ambition Hauberk reacts to what his brainwashed followers are saying.
Give the parts to Monk Aistis
Agailla Flurry has asked you to give the parts to Aistis and protect him while the system is being repaired. Do as she says.
Repair the Central Control Terminal

Agailla Flurry wants to adjust the power level of the altered system while the three Hauberks are fighting amongst themselves. You'll need to use the Central Control Terminal to do this, but it is broken. Repair the terminal.
Long Dreams Are Dreamt at Narvas Temple
Use the Warp Device
Use the Warp Device to go to where Hauberk is.
Defeat the united Hauberk
Three Hauberks are now united into one. His powers aren't fully recovered yet, but are getting stronger by the minute. Defeat Demon Lord Hauberk with the altered system before that happens.
Near the butterfly, you have read the writing on the tombstone out loud. Talk to Indrea.
After reading the writing out loud, the tree started singing. Listen to the song.
A peculiar blue apple has grown out of the tree. Talk to Indrea.

Demon Goddess Giltine came to this place to look for Goddess Laima's revelation that should have been for you, Revelator.{nl}Goddess Vivora believed that Demon Goddess Giltine was looking for a book that contained knowledge about her.{nl}
But Goddess Laima did not want you to know this much about the revelation.{nl}This revelation contains truths meant for Giltine.{nl}
You must do your best to lose it.{nl}Neringa will tell you Goddess Laima's predictions at the time when you are meant to know.{nl}
Put your faith in Goddess Laima and Neringa shall work with you.{nl}Outside of us, no one else must learn of Goddess Laima's prediction.
This is Goddess Vaivora's Fantasy Library, which has on record all of the world's knowledge and history.{nl}In this place, you can only view the information meant for you.{nl}
You will not be able to see the books that are not.{nl}This place has history and wisdom about humanity that even the Goddesses themselves do not know about.{nl}
In the far future, when you are ready to learn of it, you will be able to view it too.{nl}But now is not that time.
Neringa knew you would accept the invitation.{nl}And there is much that needs to be said.{nl}
You and Neringa will go together to Goddess Vaivora's domain.{nl}Humans are meant to approach the location primarily by invitation.{nl}
But this is still not the case.{nl}There is something you need to know.{nl}Starting from Neringa...
Revelator, you must have some concerns about this current situation.{nl}
Neringa will convey Goddess Laima's will to you.{nl}Yet only at the times deemed right.
Together with Neringa, you will go to Fantasy Library.{nl}There you will meet with Goddess Vaivora and her Kupole helper.{nl}
They will not welcome a human to the Fantasy Library.{nl}Please do not forget. Neringa recommended you for an invitation.{nl}
You are here because Neringa helped you to gain the Goddess' trust.{nl}Please continue to build her trust in you.{nl}
Focus on listening to her and completing her requests.{nl}Neringa will go first and wait for you.
So, you are the Revelator.{nl}I have heard about you from Neringa.{nl}Where you come from and where you are being pulled towards... I have heard it all.
Yet, I still have reservations about Neringa's judgement in inviting you here.{nl}I assume you have already heard from Neringa what it that we do.{nl}
I asked Neringa as well. What can a human do for us here?{nl}You will have to prove yourself through sacrifice to answer that question.{nl}
I strive to prevent humans like you from interrupting the Goddesses' work.{nl}Go help Neringa.{nl}That is something you can do.
As you can see, at the moment there is no opportunity for you to join Goddess Vaivora's plans.{nl}So, solve her smaller issues to gain her trust.{nl}
The defensive system in Sausys Room 9 is weak, allowing demons to trespass easily.{nl}But Goddess Vaivora's Kupole cannot stop them alone.{nl}
It would be good to take her place.{nl}Defeat a few of the demons and you will gain a lot Her trust.
Your ability is already known.{nl}How much you can do is also already known.{nl}Meaning, what you need to know is already known.
You did well.{nl}Right now Goddess Vaivora is in Valandis Room 2 preparing a trap to capture Demon Goddess Giltine.{nl}
She thinks that Giltine wants to get her hands on the book that's about her.{nl}It's not proper work for a goddess, but Giltine won't fall for just any trap.
You will have to work hard to gain Goddess Vaivora's trust.{nl}But the time, and the work that you have to do, has already been decided.
Set your mind towards protecting the Goddess' very precious records.{nl}Everywhere is flooded with demons destroying them.{nl}
Please go and collect these scattered records.{nl}Doing something as simple as this will surely attract the Goddess' attention.
Doing this much will draw the Goddess' attention.{nl}Goddess Vaivora believes that if Giltine is removed everything will be solved.{nl}
This means isolating her from the rest of the world.{nl}But everything that happens is influenced by the Devine Tree itself.{nl}
Even if Demon Goddess Giltine disappears other, more uncontrollable versions of her will take her place.{nl}Sadly, Goddess Vaivora does not have faith in Goddess Laima's prediction.{nl}
She also does not have faith in you, who was selected by Laima.{nl}Therefore, here, together with the hand of faith, you must match Goddess Lamia's prediction.
Kupole Rugile is alone in Sausys Room 9 dealing with the demons.{nl}Despite being Vaivora's Kupole, she will not be able to handle them all alone.{nl}
You must help Kupole Rugile.{nl}However, Vaivora's Kupole will be weary of you since you are a human.{nl}
Before approaching her, remove the Kupole trap set by the demons.{nl}Kupole Rugile will show interest in you after this. And, of course, this interest will be conveyed to Goddess Vaivora.
You are the human Neringa invited.{nl}There is something a human can do to help us...{nl}
You seem strong enough and ready to serve the goddess.{nl}If there is no other place you must be, can you help me?
It's a difficult situation.{nl}Vaivora and I sealed off all of the passages used by the demons.{nl}But how are they still able to enter?{nl}
Certainly, by someone's help they are entering.{nl}This scroll can detect the small gaps in which the demons are using to invade.{nl}
With this scroll, find the point of invasion and remove it.{nl}I will not be able to hold out for long if this continues.
This place has been run by Goddess Vaivora and the Kupoles for a long time.{nl}This place is unbeknownst even to the followers of Vaivora.
It's more than just a few demons that have entered.{nl}And they are ruining the library.{nl}
I do not know what it is they seek, but I cannot allow them to touch the records at will.{nl}Please get rid of the demons you see in the area.
Possibly the records of the great and unnamed kings have already disappeared. {nl}As time passes, so will more and more records.{nl}Please stop the demons.
Thank you so much.{nl}Thanks to you we can protect the records that are under our care.
After seeing your actions here, it seems you would be an even greater help to the Goddess.{nl}We will tell the Goddess of your courage and sacrifice.{nl}
Now return to Neringa and tell her of your accomplishment.{nl}And, by all means, please use your power in correct place.
You have returned.{nl}The news of you helping Rugile has been passed on to Goddess Vaivora.{nl}We can now move on to the next stage.{nl}
You with Neringa will meet someone you have had a long ill-fated relationship with.{nl}Let's go to Sausys Room 10.
You are the first to be invited here.{nl}In the past, there was commotion because of those who were not invited.
Slowly more and more demons are invading.{nl}It's hard for me to figure out alone how they are coming here.{nl}
I've done all I've could but it's not enough.{nl}However, if you can help me, I will be able to gather some time.{nl}
Suspicious magic gathering demons have been found.{nl}If you can defeat them, it will decrease the number of demons coming this way.{nl}Please do this for us.
Although I know a great scale of the Fantasy Library, there are thousands of areas.{nl}If the demons enter through another location this will cause huge problems.
At least I have one less nuisance to deal with.{nl}I appreciate your help.
The invading demons are damaging the books.{nl}They do not hesitate with their meaningless plundering.{nl}
Maybe their leader said to destroy whatever they could get their hands on.{nl}If you want to help the Goddess don't allow them to run away with the records.{nl}
Please recover the unidentified records that the demons stole.
We still have not found a place for all that is contained in the Fantasy Library.{nl}The records that Vaivora and us, the Kupole, still need to classify are slowly coming in.
I see the damaged records. Those demons...{nl}
After this is done, Vaivora will punish those demons.{nl} Thank you for your help.
Everything have been decided.{nl}Even if you try to fight your destiny, the end will be the same.{nl}You are on the right track. You are doing well.
Vaivora will help solve everything.
Goddess Vaivora has almost completed her plan.{nl}But we cannot have the Beholder interfere.{nl}
Your work here should stand out.{nl}Therefore, Vaivora will have a request for you in the next District.{nl}
This place is overrun with the Beholder's plans.{nl}Everywhere the Kupole are falling into its traps and getting into trouble.{nl}
We must rid Sausys Room 10 of the Beholder's shadow.{nl}Destroy the first corrupted crystal.{nl}
If you leave the corrupted crystal alone, the Beholder and the demons will continue to harass the Kupole.{nl}And, remember, the fact that Neringa is here must not be revealed.
The Beholder thinks the situation will go according to plan.{nl}But everything will go as predicted. Focus on your role.
Destroying that many will be enough.{nl}It will be troublesome if the Beholder becomes aware of us.
Destroying the corrupted crystals made the plan smoother.{nl}Kupole Saya is dealing with the invading demons here.{nl}
But there were so many, she went into hiding to replenish her energy.{nl}You will present a good impression if you defeat the demons that are near her.{nl}
Defeat the demons and then go to Kupole Saya.
There is no better way. Follow the chosen path.
You are the human traveling with Neringa.{nl}I'm surprised that a human can defeat these demons.{nl}You could be a powerful asset to Vaivora.
As the demons invaded they destroyed most of the protection crystals.{nl}If they are not restored the demons will treat this place like their house.{nl}

If you want to help Vaivora, first help to restore the protection crystals.{nl}The protection crystals were shattered into Trasium Pieces, please collect as many Trasium Pieces as possible and return to me.
I do not know how far you will accomplish, but I will not refuse you even if you fail.{nl}Whereever you go, you are still just a human.
I'm surprised. You have completely changed my thoughts about humans.{nl}Have all humans become as strong as you?
While you were away Neringa contacted me.{nl}
I told her about your skillfulness.{nl}But Neringa's thinking seems a little different.
You did well. Saya has praised you.{nl}Now there is only one more Kupole to save.
I'm planning to collect Trasium Pieces in order to restore the protection crystals.{nl}I hope we can use your strength when the time comes.
The Beholder has installed a magic prison to keep the Kupole.{nl}Goddess Vaivora's main helper, Kupole Ouida is here as well.{nl}
If you save her, Goddess Vaivora's expectations of you will rise.{nl}Destroy the magic prison and save Kupole Ouida.{nl}
She will then have a request for you.{nl}After that we will meet the Beholder.
I trust and follow you in accordance with the prediction.{nl}Refrain from unnecessary actions and concentrate on your role.
And you are?{nl}
A human... I thought I would be saved by Vaivora...{nl}It's not what I expected but thank you for rescuing me.
The Beholder has installed magical prisons everywhere.{nl}The Kupole are in a state of confusion allowing the Beholder to rummage through the library.{nl}
But we cannot allow this to continue.{nl}Will you allow them to roam around Vaivora's library? Open your eyes.{nl}
The reason they can roam here is because the protection crystals were destroyed.{nl}The remaining one is being attacked by the demons now.{nl}
Ride this transportation device to the crystal.{nl}Defeat them all with your power.
You do not need to return to Ouida.{nl}Time is short. We must go to Goddess Vaivora after facing him.
The Beholder must be growing aware that their plan is falling apart.{nl}Soon the Beholder will be here. Are you ready?
The Beholder follows Demon Goddess Giltine but shows no interest in her safety.{nl}He will leave soon.{nl}
With Neringa, you will need to go to Valandis Room 2.{nl}When you are ready, follow. Neringa will go first and wait for you.
The Beholder still does not know you and Neringa are here.{nl}Neringa will stay out of the way until the Beholder thinks the task is done.{nl}
If Neringa is discovered here, Giltine will be alerted.{nl}Now we have to let them destroy the Fantasy Library.
Why did they come here at this time?{nl}This is troublesome.
Talk of you helping Vaivora's Kupoles is circulating amongst them.{nl}Goddess Vaivora will come to look for you soon.{nl}
She will trust you and tell you her plans.{nl}But you and Neringa's plans differ from the Goddess Vaivora's.{nl}
Don't forget this. Listen politely to all the Goddess has to say.{nl}Goddess is coming.
In fact, Goddess Vaivora has more conviction than Neringa thought.{nl} Neringa will need to execute this plan more precisely.
Kupole Litae and Danute are in charge of this area.{nl}Kupole Litae will still be unsure about you.{nl}
But defeat the demons and she will come to your way.{nl}Please listen to her request. For Neringa's role, Neringa will leave first.
I can't believe you came here, but even more so, I can't believe your skills.{nl}
I've heard of your courage and sacrifice from the other Kupole.{nl}Thank you very much for coming to help me.
You've arrived. Did Kupole Litae greet you well?{nl}
The Kupole are also different in their thinking and personalities.{nl}Some listen better than others.{nl}
{nl}Goddess Vaivora will come to find you again.{nl}But before that, there is something you need to prepare.{nl}
You and Neringa will face Giltine in Valandis Room 91.{nl}The Demon God can take your life with just one finger.{nl}
So please find the item Nobraenal Blueprint so that Neringa may use that to protect you.{nl}With Neringa's divine energy and that item I will be able to hold back her power.{nl}
Unfortunately, Goddess Laima cannot protect you.{nl}However, Neringa will tell you how to protect yourself.{nl}
Believe Neringa and follow what Neringa says.
That should be enough.{nl}Neringa will tell you when it is time to use it.
Now go to Goddess Vaivora.{nl}There are still parts Neringa needs to prepare for the plan.
Your help is making the final preparations much easier.{nl}Now, please help us one last time.
I must leave this place to examine Giltine's actions more closely.{nl}Kupole Danute is coming so please lend a hand. I hope that you help her.
As Vaivora predicted, the demons are gathering her to make it easier for Giltine to enter.{nl}There is no time to waste so I must ask you for two items.
The first is Dimensional Essense. That will be easy to find around here.{nl}The last one will be a problem...
Defeat the demons and gather their magic source.{nl}After collecting both, come back here.
The protection crystals are under attack!{nl}Since all of the library's energy is directed towards the trap, there is only one protection crystal guarding this area.{nl}

If the protection crystals are not working, Giltine will still be able to escape even if we seal her within our trap.{nl}Take this tool and until the protection crystals are recharged fight off the demons!
Thank you! And Neringa has returned as well.{nl}I will go and help with Vaivora's seal.  I'm grateful for your help!
Vaivora has finished her seal for Giltine.{nl}Unfortunately, Giltine will not appear this time.
Please remain calm and do as Vaivora instructed.{nl}Come back to Neringa when the work there is done.{nl}
Neringa is preparing for the next plan.
That is a record. Neringa will give it back to Vaivora.{nl}Right now you must deal with the embarrassed Goddess of Knowledge.{nl}
Goddess Vaivora know much more than you or Neringa, expect for the future.{nl}Therefore it is impossible to convince Vaivora.
Vaivora will now make an extreme choice.{nl}Give up the revelation and remove Giltine from this world.{nl}
She still thinks that is correct.{nl}In the meantime, let's move to Valandis Room 3.{nl}
There you and Neringa will listen to the Goddess plans and follow.{nl}Neringa will go first.
Goddess Vaivora has instructed you to collect all the magical energy that can be used on the alter for the seal.{nl}There are devices around the library that you can collect the magic from.{nl}
Please activate them.{nl}The activated magic devices will go where they are needed.
There was a human who came here without an invitation.{nl}But you are the first to be formally invited.
That looks like enough.{nl}Also, Neringa is looking for you. It would be good if you go.{nl}
I will finish the rest of the work here.{nl} I will be off.
I'm surprised by your work. Human potential seems to know no bounds.{nl}To play a part in continuing human history, I will tell you something.{nl}
Several hundred years ago, Demon Goddess Giltine had already invaded this place.{nl}She was looking for a record of herself.{nl}
But at the time she could not obtain it.{nl}So she comes again today.{nl}I do not know where she will use it.{nl}
But she is coming to this place soon to get her hands on that record.{nl}We have taken advantage of her greed by preparing a trap.{nl}
As she becomes overcome with joy for finally getting her hands on the record, she will disappear from this world.{nl}If she disappears from this world, every problem will be solved.{nl}
All of the Goddesses will return to their rightful places and you too may go home.{nl}For this I need you help.{nl}
My Kupole are in the final stages of perfecting the trap.{nl}Please help them. I also have last minute preparations.{nl}
Once again, thank you for your courage and you sacrifice.{nl}For the sake of the world, please endure just a little bit longer.
Please collect them quickly!
Kupole Danute is still unfocused. This may be a handful for a human such as yourself.{nl}But if you have nothing else to do...
Vaivora wants to destroy a part of the Fantasy Library in order to block future entry.{nl}But it will not go according to the Goddess' wish.{nl}
It's quite unfortunate... To ensure that the prediction comes true, you must artfully disrupt the Goddess' plan.{nl}And Goddess must not know what you and Neringa are the ones to blame.{nl}
So follow the Goddess' plan for awhile.{nl}When it is time to execute our own plan, Neringa will call you.
To sacrifice a part of the district to capture Giltine.{nl}Vaivora's plan seems reckless.{nl}
Vaivora will ask you to activate the sealing device set up in Valandis Room 3.{nl}Go about the task.{nl}
Neringa will also do as such.{nl}Go to Vaivora.{nl}
Neringa will call you when it is time.
Time is running out and there are not many Kupoles remaining that I can call...{nl}You will be able to help me.{nl}
Here Skywa is helping me to operate the Bluenode Collapsing Device.{nl}But the energy from this device is calling demons to it.{nl}
Please go there and protect the device for me.{nl}If we lose even one, Giltine will slip away.
It hurts me as well to make such a decision.{nl}And I will bear this crime for eternity.{nl}
But to save the world from Giltine's grip...{nl}It's an expensive sacrifice that must be done.
Amazing!{nl}The activated collapsing device will conceal its magic, and will not face attack again.{nl}
Now Skywa will activate the collapsing device remotely.
Next we need to activate the second collapsing device.{nl}However, it does not have enough energy to run.{nl}
Gather the Gigantic magic source around the area of the second collapsing device.{nl}After that, listen to Meringa about what to do next.{nl}
I will return after surveilling Valandis Room 91.
I will not be gone long.{nl}However, while I am away please consult Neringa if you need help.
Our goal is to cause the Blanorth collapsing device to overload.{nl}Until then we will continue to follow Vaivora's plan, so as to not alert suspicion.
Kupole Skywa is walking around and managing the collapsing devices.{nl}
Operating them is simple enough. Insert the Gigantic magic source that you have in your possession into the device.{nl}As the device re-energizes, protect it until it can conceal its magic.
Right now the Goddess is checking on Demon Goddess Giltine's rampage in Valandis Room 91.{nl}
As pressing as the matter is, the Goddess will not use the Fantasy Library as a burial ground for Giltine.{nl}Please follow the plan thoughtfully and reliably.
You have successfully energized the device.{nl}It's good to know the plan is right on schedule.{nl}
Giltine is currently in Valandis Room 91 searching frankly for the revelation.{nl}Let us finally finish the task before us.
Now, there are only a few devices left to run.{nl}
But is there enough time to leave everything to Skywa... And it would be difficult to protect.{nl}Would you be willing to help Skywa?{nl}
Make you way to Ballandans collapsing device.{nl}Skywa will be waiting for you there.
The human helping Vaivora is you?{nl}This is my first time seeing one, but you seem particularly strong.{nl}
I have a job for you...
Not too long ago, I set the Ballandans Collapsing Device.{nl}I was going activate another devicce here as well, but the demons swarmed me.{nl}
If I waste my time on them, I won't be able to finish the work Vaivora gave me.{nl}How about clearing demons from around the Ballandans collapsing device?{nl}
You just need to protect it until the device is set and conseals itself...{nl}While you deal with this, I'll be able to go and finish my other remaining tasks.
Thank you so much! Humans are so kind, no?{nl}Alright, I'm going to go finish my other preparations. I'm counting on you.
Your help is appreciated. Thanks to you, Skywa was able to complete the rest of the preparations.{nl}Now only Balanorth collapsing device is left.{nl}
Shall I give this remaining task to you?{nl}When all is ready, just turn on the device.{nl}
Oh, right Neringa was looking for you. It seems she also needs your help.{nl}I'll wait here for your successful return.
Everything has been prepared.{nl}And Vaivora has no reason to distrust you.{nl}
You received the request to handle the Balanorth collapsing device, no?{nl}When go to run that device, the head monsters will appear and interrupt you.{nl}
When the head monsters are defeated they will release great amounts of energy.{nl}We will use that.{nl}
Please lure the head monsters closer to the Balanorth device and defeat them there.{nl}Their released energy will overheat the device and destroy it.{nl}
Then Vaivora's mission will fail in its final step.{nl}Once you have completed this task, you and Neringa will go together to Valandis Room 91.{nl}
Please do not forget.{nl}You must defeat the head monsters when they are nearest to the device.
All of history is recorded in Fantasy Library. Of course, records about you are also here.{nl}This is a situation where a human is involved in both Goddess and demon history.{nl}
But, sadly, it will not be recorded.{nl}Neringa has destroyed all records of your involvement.
Vaivora has sensed that something has gone wrong.{nl}She believed all to be finished.{nl}
But right now there is no reason to care about her.{nl}Neringa will head towards Valandis Room 91 first.{nl}
Inform Vaivora that the plan has failed.{nl}Then you must come straight to Valandis Room 91.{nl}
Neringa will wait for you there.
How did it turn out like this?{nl}The device isn't responding.{nl}
You've failed me.{nl}Now I see the human limit.{nl}
I was stupid...{nl}
But it's not your fault.{nl}It was my fault for giving such an important task to a human.{nl}
The Next plan is...{nl}
To stop Giltine I could...
Everywhere has become polluted and ruined by Demon Goddess Giltine.{nl}Vaivora, before she destroys everything, us included, you must take action.
It's no use.{nl}There is no way a human can compete against a Demon God..{nl}
However, a human chosen by Laima may be different.{nl}I wish not to put you harm's way.{nl}
But I need you to buy us some time until the Kupole and I can figure out how to trap Giltine.{nl}Right now, this is our best plan..
Demon Goddess Giltine is summoning her demons to Valandis Room 91.{nl}
Neringa is sure she is residing there.{nl}You need to stop Giltine before she gets her hands on the revelation and escapes.{nl}
To do this you must destroy the dimensional doors used to summon the demons.{nl}Then, you and Neringa will need to prepare a way to keep you safe from Giltine.{nl}
But first, destroy the doors.{nl}This incident is coming to an end just as the Goddess predicted.{nl}
And your role has become more important.{nl}Neringa will make the necessary preparations and, during this time, destroy as many dimensional doors as possible.
We have almost reached where Demon God Giltine is residing.{nl}Nearby is the revelation Goddess Laima prepared for Giltine.{nl}
Giltine has already burned her way through the library to reach that one revelation.{nl}And Goddess Laima has said that you also must be there.{nl}
Stay near Neringa. Neringa will keep you safe.{nl}But you must also keep Neringa safe from the demon minions.{nl}
Now let us follow Giltine.{nl}Now we only need to follow Giltine.{nl}Stay close. If you get too far away from Neringa, you will be struck by Giltine's power.
Goddess Laima spoke of a day where Giltine's black wings will be broken.{nl}But this is not that day.{nl}
From here forward, you will face Giltine alone.{nl}Neringa did not appear in the final scene of Goddess Laima's prediction.{nl}
Under the black wing's shadow is the future.{nl}suppress your fear and continue forward.
Fate, itself, will protect you.{nl}Go forth, Revelator.
You have successfully fulfilled Goddess Laima's prediction.Then, Neringa's role here is done.{nl}But the journey for you has not come to an end.
Now that this is over, Goddess Laima wished to guide you to Astral Tower.{nl}At the tower will be a revelation for you to find.{nl}
At Astral Tower there will be new hardships and revelations waiting for you.{nl}However, all of this follows from Goddess Laima. You will be safe.{nl}
Before leaving, report to Vaivora that the revelation was not retrieved.{nl}And that Neringa has also left.{nl}She will not ask you why.
I see.. this is how things turned out.{nl}I appreciate your courage and sacrifice.{nl}
This is the second time I have missed Giltine in my own library.{nl}It seems Laima and my sisters will berate me for this..{nl}
I knew that Neringa would leave eventually.{nl}She was always around but her presence was never imposing.{nl}
If we meet again, there is much I want to ask.{nl}But it will have to wait until the world is freed from Giltine's grasp.{nl}
This power was something given to me by Laima through Neringa.{nl}And it was Neringa who told me to pass this on to you, once everything was finished.{nl}
I pray this will be useful to you.
